name: Ultramarine Olfa Nage
description:
It's a story of girls who resist fate.

A long war between the "Kingdom of Soraha" and the "Empire", later called the "Great War".

​

Against an empire that summons monsters with a forbidden curse and overwhelms with unknown forces

The Kingdom of Soraha has won a hard victory by making full use of force and wisdom.

​

Shortly after the end of the war, the emperor passed away, and the empire quietly disappeared from history.

​

The orphans from the empire who barely survived were taken over by the benevolent King Soraha.

It will be protected in an orphanage called "Ultramarine".

​

It's been over 20 years since then.

Orphans are ridiculed as "LOSER" and suffer a lot of discrimination

He lived poorly and quietly in a corner of Soraha.

​

One day, Niina, an orphan who searches for <imperial heritage> without telling everyone.

In an undeveloped cave, you will encounter a "demon" who is said to be the survivor of the war.

​

Numerous incidents that occur at the same time

Gradually eroding their daily lives ...

​

Is it hope or despair to grab in the "time to be repeated"?

The "story against fate" surrounding "Gunsei Orphanage" is about to begin.
